EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_CF Summit Customer Event_Santa Clara_Q217.Reminder2017_norequireme
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal & VMware Cocktail reception is tonight!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal & VMware Cocktail Reception at Cloud Foundry Summit. This is a reminder that the reception is tonight at 7:30PM directly following the Cloud Foundry Summit Booth Crawl.
Head upstairs directly above Exhibit Hall B to the Great America Hall for cocktails and conversations.
Date: Tuesday, June 13, 2017
Time:
7:30 - 9:30PM
Location:
Great America Hall | 2nd Floor Santa Clara Convention Center 5001 Great America Pkwy Santa Clara, CA, 95054 (map <[[http://santaclaraconventioncenter.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/SC_Floorplan-2017.pdf]]>)
We look forward to seeing you there.
Event Details <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/CF-Summit-Cocktail-Reception-SantaClara.html]]>
